column5: With all the new regulations slated for Ontario, does anyone know of any changes for Quebec fishing??

They have their new regs out. Check it out at www.fapaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/index1.htm. Say hello to that seperatist Lucien Bouchard if you see him. We love him here in Ontario because a lot of business has relocated to our province. We love you Lucien. Good fishing: Frank
Not such a bad day for those of us of who aren't 'pur laine' over here :).
I wonder what the French definition for "Pure Walleye Fisherman" is. Up here the definition for "pur laine" is a six pack of Molson Canadian or is it Molson Canadien. Frank
>I wonder what the French definition >for "Pure Walleye Fisherman" is. I'm not sure, but the 'pur pecheur de dore'would no doubt blame cold fronts and bad bites on the federal government ;).
